```{r setup}
library(linreg)
```

# Overview
The linreg function 
```{r}
linreg(rep(0,10), 1:10, mtcars)
```

# Performance
The output's correctness can be verified by the lm function. 
```{r}
test1 = as.matrix(linreg("hp", "mpg", mtcars))
test2 = summary(lm(hp ~ mpg, data=mtcars))$coefficients

# ignoring differences in row/column names
rownames(test1) = NULL
colnames(test1) = NULL
rownames(test2) = NULL
colnames(test2) = NULL

all.equal(test1, test2)
```
